Introduction to Linux

This post is for the workshop “Introduction to Linux” on 27th September

In this workshop, the Phoenix team will go through some basics of Linux with you. As Linux runs on almost all the High Performance Computing (HPC) facilities around the globe, this workshop will provid you a stepping stone to get into the HPC field. In this workshop, we will forcus on some of the most frequently used terminal commands in Linux and experiment with scripting. So without further do, let’s get underway

Start “Introduction to Linux for Phoenix Users”


From Phoenix Team

Written on August 29th, 2017 by Robert Qiao
